duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement comprehensive communication strategies to promote the agency's AI-focused services and drive thought leadership initiatives.
Collaborate with subject matter experts, data scientists, and technical teams to translate complex AI concepts into engaging content for diverse audiences.
Manage marketing campaigns for clients and develop relationships with key industry influencers, media outlets, and associations to increase brand visibility.
Monitor industry trends, competitor activities, and client feedback to identify new opportunities and adjust communication strategies.
Lead knowledge management for internal AI communications, and act as the central point of contact within the Edelman network for AI-related inquiries.
Craft compelling narratives and messages for diverse audiences and manage multiple projects and stakeholders simultaneously.
Create research-based content, white papers, and present at industry conferences, leveraging digital marketing channels and tools.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, or related field (Advanced degrees are a plus)
